What the hell is going on!\""},{"lineNumber":173124,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵の攻撃が激しくなってやがるぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The enemy's attacks are getting fiercer!\""},{"lineNumber":173125,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は追っ手の魔物達から隠れて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others hid from the pursuing monsters,"},{"lineNumber":173126,"originalJapaneseLine":"入り組んだ地下水脈を逃げ回っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"running through the intricate underground water veins."},{"lineNumber":173127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一度攻められたからだろうのう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's probably because we attacked them once."},{"lineNumber":173128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　向こうも本気になったってわけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"They've gotten serious about it too.\""},{"lineNumber":173129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、どうするつもりだ、心の友」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what do you intend to do, my dear friend?\""},{"lineNumber":173130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？　なにがだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? About what?\""},{"lineNumber":173131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂にまで隠し事するな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't keep secrets from me."},{"lineNumber":173132,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっきは空元気でケイブリスを倒すと","translatedEnglishLine":"Earlier you were all pumped up saying we'd defeat Cavebris,"},{"lineNumber":173133,"originalJapaneseLine":"　息巻いておったが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but...\""},{"lineNumber":173134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それがまだ無理なことは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...even you know it's still impossible,"},{"lineNumber":173135,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今のお前さんでも承知しとるだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"no matter how you look at it.\""},{"lineNumber":173136,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、俺様は無敵だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, I am invincible."},{"lineNumber":173137,"originalJapaneseLine":"　負けはない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I cannot be defeated.\""},{"lineNumber":173138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリスに近づくだけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just getting close to Cavebris,"},{"lineNumber":173139,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これだけ苦労してりゃ先が知れてるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and we're struggling this much, you can tell how it'll end.\""},{"lineNumber":173140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何か策を立てるにしろ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if we come up with a plan..."},{"lineNumber":173141,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦力がこれしかないのではな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"with only this much strength...\""},{"lineNumber":173142,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せめて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At least..."},{"lineNumber":173143,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう少し戦力があれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"if we had just a bit more strength...\""},{"lineNumber":173144,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だー！　やかましいやかましい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah! You're so noisy, so noisy!\""},{"lineNumber":173145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「のわわー、振り回すなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, stop swinging me around!\""},{"lineNumber":173146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここだー！　みんな来ーい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here! Everyone come here!"},{"lineNumber":173147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間共がいやがったぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are humans here!\""},{"lineNumber":173148,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げ、見つかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, we've been spotted.\""},{"lineNumber":173149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんな大声出してれば当然でしょーが！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course they would hear with that loud shouting!\""},{"lineNumber":173150,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、ゴタゴタ言うな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, stop whining!"},{"lineNumber":173151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦闘だ！　ブッ殺せー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's battle time! Kill them!\""},{"lineNumber":173152,"originalJapaneseLine":"地下水脈の中で魔人討伐隊と","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the underground water veins, a large-scale battle broke out between the demon extermination squad and"},{"lineNumber":173153,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物の部隊との大規模な戦闘が始まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the monster troops."},{"lineNumber":173154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい！　うっとうしい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh! You're so bothersome!\""},{"lineNumber":173155,"originalJapaneseLine":"「泣き言を言うな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't complain!"},{"lineNumber":173156,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ、シーザー、叩き潰してやれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, Caesar, crush them!\""},{"lineNumber":173157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハイ、サテラ様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, Lady Satella!\""},{"lineNumber":173158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ！　なんて強さだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn! What strength!\""},{"lineNumber":173159,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい！　誰か後方に回って、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey! Someone flank from the rear and"},{"lineNumber":173160,"originalJapaneseLine":"　増援を呼んできてくれー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"bring reinforcements!\""},{"lineNumber":173161,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだとぉ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?"},{"lineNumber":173162,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くっ、キリがないぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn, this is endless!\""},{"lineNumber":173163,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス殿……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Lance..."},{"lineNumber":173164,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですが、何か……妙です」","translatedEnglishLine":"But something... is strange.\""},{"lineNumber":173165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「妙だと？　何がだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Strange? What do you mean?\""},{"lineNumber":173166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh..."},{"lineNumber":173167,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは、その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it's just that...\""},{"lineNumber":173168,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵の動きに違和感があるのだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's the enemy's movements that feel off."},{"lineNumber":173169,"originalJapaneseLine":"　敵兵が中央に寄りすぎだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy soldiers are clustering too much in the center.\""},{"lineNumber":173170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、まるで奴ら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, it's like they're being"},{"lineNumber":173171,"originalJapaneseLine":"　挟み撃ちにされてるみてぇだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"completely surrounded and ambushed.\""},{"lineNumber":173172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「挟み撃ちだと？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Surrounded and ambushed?"},{"lineNumber":173173,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、なんでそんなことに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But why would that happen...?\""},{"lineNumber":173174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあー、そこまでは分からないの。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I don't know that much."},{"lineNumber":173175,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごめんねー☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry~ ☆\""},{"lineNumber":173176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":173177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ランス様！　あれを見て下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Lord Lance! Look at that!\""},{"lineNumber":173178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわぁあ！　なんだこのデカブツはぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa! What is that huge thing?!\""},{"lineNumber":173179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだぁ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is that?"},{"lineNumber":173180,"originalJapaneseLine":"　向こうでぽいぽいと敵が投げ飛ばされて……","translatedEnglishLine":"Enemies are being tossed around over there...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひぐっ、ぐすっ、ぐすっ……」
「ほだされるんじゃない、馬鹿者」
「くそっ！　どうなってやがる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it! What the hell is going on!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵の攻撃が激しくなってやがるぞー！」
ランス達は追っ手の魔物達から隠れて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others hid from the pursuing monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入り組んだ地下水脈を逃げ回っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: running through the intricate underground water veins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一度攻められたからだろうのう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's probably because we attacked them once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうも本気になったってわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've gotten serious about it too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、どうするつもりだ、心の友」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what do you intend to do, my dear friend?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なにがだ？」
「儂にまで隠し事するな。
さっきは空元気でケイブリスを倒すと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Earlier you were all pumped up saying we'd defeat Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 息巻いておったが……」
「……それがまだ無理なことは
今のお前さんでも承知しとるだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter how you look at it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、俺様は無敵だ。
負けはない」
「ケイブリスに近づくだけで、
これだけ苦労してりゃ先が知れてるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we're struggling this much, you can tell how it'll end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何か策を立てるにしろ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if we come up with a plan...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦力がこれしかないのではな……」
「せめて……
もう少し戦力があれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if we had just a bit more strength..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だー！　やかましいやかましい！」
「のわわー、振り回すなー！」
「ここだー！　みんな来ーい！
人間共がいやがったぞー！」
「げ、見つかった」
「あんな大声出してれば当然でしょーが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course they would hear with that loud shouting!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、ゴタゴタ言うな！
戦闘だ！　ブッ殺せー！」
地下水脈の中で魔人討伐隊と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the underground water veins, a large-scale battle broke out between the demon extermination squad and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の部隊との大規模な戦闘が始まった。
「ええい！　うっとうしい！」
「泣き言を言うな！
さあ、シーザー、叩き潰してやれ！」
「ハイ、サテラ様！」
「くそ！　なんて強さだ！
おい！　誰か後方に回って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey! Someone flank from the rear and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 増援を呼んできてくれー！」
「なんだとぉ！？
くっ、キリがないぞ！」
「ランス殿……
ですが、何か……妙です」
「妙だと？　何がだ？」
それは、その……」
「敵の動きに違和感があるのだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's the enemy's movements that feel off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵兵が中央に寄りすぎだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy soldiers are clustering too much in the center."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、まるで奴ら、
挟み撃ちにされてるみてぇだ」
「挟み撃ちだと？
だが、なんでそんなことに……」
「さあー、そこまでは分からないの。
ごめんねー☆」
「あ、ランス様！　あれを見て下さい！」
「うわぁあ！　なんだこのデカブツはぁ！」
「なんだぁ？
向こうでぽいぽいと敵が投げ飛ばされて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enemies are being tossed around over there..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

さっきは空元気でケイブリスを倒すと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Earlier you were all pumped up saying we'd defeat Cavebris,

今のお前さんでも承知しとるだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter how you look at it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の部隊との大規模な戦闘が始まった。

おい！　誰か後方に回って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey! Someone flank from the rear and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 増援を呼んできてくれー！」
「なんだとぉ！？
くっ、キリがないぞ！」
「ランス殿……
ですが、何か……妙です」
「妙だと？　何がだ？」
それは、その……」
「敵の動きに違和感があるのだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's the enemy's movements that feel off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵兵が中央に寄りすぎだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy soldiers are clustering too much in the center."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、まるで奴ら、
挟み撃ちにされてるみてぇだ」
「挟み撃ちだと？
だが、なんでそんなことに……」
「さあー、そこまでは分からないの。
ごめんねー☆」
「あ、ランス様！　あれを見て下さい！」
「うわぁあ！　なんだこのデカブツはぁ！」
「なんだぁ？
向こうでぽいぽいと敵が投げ飛ばされて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enemies are being tossed around over there..."
